items.sentence: How long are you going to just sit there and do nothing?
In the beginning, God created the heavens and the earth.
It makes no difference whether you go today or tomorrow.
It was really noisy in the room so Tom covered his ears.
Is there something in particular that you want to learn?
The hospital food wasn\'t as bad as I expected it to be.
The problem is that Tom doesn\'t always do his homework.
Tom said he couldn\'t clean the pool tomorrow afternoon.
Tom said he didn\'t understand what Mary said in French.
Tom said he doesn\'t know where Mary bought her bicycle.
